name: Raindrops 8 AR
description: The Raindrops Augmented Reality App gives you an opportunity to transform your learning process into an exciting 3D journey. The Raindrops AR App brings topics covered in the lessons to life, through detailed animated characters and elements that pop up on the pages. You can use the App to interact with the 3D objects and tap on them to learn more. With just a single scan, you can watch an ocean bed come to life, follow a game of cricket and learn about amazing mythical creatures from ancient times, and much more!  Use this app for a fun-filled and an enriching augmented reality journey!
